Sql.query: SELECT * FROM CAM_CCGDD WHERE IND_DEL = :IND_DEL ORDER BY CCGDDCODI DESC

INSERT INTO CAM_CCGDD ( CCGDDCODI, PROYCODI, HORA, DEMANDA, GENERACION, USU_CREACION, FEC_CREACION, IND_DEL ) VALUES ( :CCGDDCODI, :PROYCODI, :HORA, :DEMANDA, :GENERACION, :USU_CREACION, :FEC_CREACION, :IND_DEL )

UPDATE CAM_CCGDD SET PROYCODI = :PROYCODI, HORA = :HORA, DEMANDA = :DEMANDA, GENERACION = :GENERACION, USU_MODIFICACION = :USU_MODIFICACION, FEC_MODIFICACION = :FEC_MODIFICACION, IND_DEL = :IND_DEL, USU_MODIFICACION = :USU_MODIFICACION, FEC_MODIFICACION = :FEC_MODIFICACION WHERE CCGDDCODI = :CCGDDCODI
SELECT * FROM CAM_CCGDD ORDER BY CCGDDCODI DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
UPDATE CAM_CCGDD SET IND_DEL = :IND_DEL, USU_MODIFICACION = :USU_MODIFICACION, FEC_MODIFICACION = :FEC_MODIFICACION WHERE PROYCODI = :PROYCODI AND IND_DEL = 0
SELECT * FROM CAM_CCGDD WHERE PROYCODI = :PROYCODI AND IND_DEL = :IND_DEL
